title: Lunch and Listen - Episode 2
description: You deserve a break! Stop what you’re doing and join Reggie Yates and Katherine Ryan with host Clara Amfo.

text: You deserve a break! Stop what you’re doing and join Reggie Yates and Katherine Ryan with host Clara Amfo, as they get artistic on the Galaxy Note 20 whilst sharing their personal passions at Samsung KX.

Samsung KX’s all new series Lunch & Listen is here to help you reclaim your lunch break! Hosted by Clara Amfo, this fun and engaging two-part series sees special guests Katherine Ryan, Munya Chawawa, Reggie Yates and Amelia Dimoldenberg reveal their hidden hobbies and talk about how they reclaim their free time - inspiring you to do the same.
